member.name: T:RGN.Modules.Marketplace.MarketplaceModule
member.summary: This module is responsible for markeplace functionality.

member.name: T:RGN.Modules.Marketplace.MarketplaceOfferData
member.summary: Represents a Marketplace Offer in the Ready Games Network (RGN) with its associated properties.

member.name: F:RGN.Modules.Marketplace.MarketplaceOfferData.id
member.summary: Unique identifier for the Marketplace Offer.

member.name: F:RGN.Modules.Marketplace.MarketplaceOfferData.appIds
member.summary: List of application identifiers that are included in this Marketplace Offer.

member.name: F:RGN.Modules.Marketplace.MarketplaceOfferData.inventoryItemIds
member.summary: List of inventory items included into this marketplace offer

member.name: F:RGN.Modules.Marketplace.MarketplaceOfferData.virtualItemIds
member.summary: List of virtual items included into this marketplace offer

member.name: F:RGN.Modules.Marketplace.MarketplaceOfferData.status
member.summary: Status of the marketplace offer. Possible values are: 'on_sale' - when the offer is created by the seller and nobody has tried to purchase it yet 'pending' - when there is a blockchain transaction pending. Happens when the offer is purchased

member.name: F:RGN.Modules.Marketplace.MarketplaceOfferData.tags
member.summary: List of the tags for the marketplace offer

member.name: F:RGN.Modules.Marketplace.MarketplaceOfferData.ownerId
member.summary: User identifier of the creator of this marketplace offer. The user who tries to sell the inventory items

member.name: F:RGN.Modules.Marketplace.MarketplaceOfferData.createdAt
member.summary: The UNIX timestamp representing when the Marketplace Offer was created. in milliseconds since midnight, January 1, 1970 UTC. Refer to for helper methods. This field is automatically populated by the backend

member.name: F:RGN.Modules.Marketplace.MarketplaceOfferData.updatedAt
member.summary: The UNIX timestamp representing when the Marketplace Offer was last updated. in milliseconds since midnight, January 1, 1970 UTC. Refer to for helper methods. This field is automatically populated by the backend

member.name: F:RGN.Modules.Marketplace.MarketplaceOfferData.createdBy
member.summary: Identifier for the user who created the Marketplace Offer.

member.name: F:RGN.Modules.Marketplace.MarketplaceOfferData.updatedBy
member.summary: Identifier for the user who last updated the Marketplace Offer.

member.name: T:RGN.Modules.Marketplace.GetGamePassUserDataResponseData
member.summary: Represents the response data received when requesting Game Pass user data.

member.name: T:RGN.Modules.Marketplac.GetForCurrentAppResponseData
member.summary: Represents the response data received when requesting Game Pass data for the current application.
